DOC.brief_summary: Context : Sirolimus-eluting stent paclitaxel-eluting stent , compare bare-metal stent , reduce risk restenosis . It unclear whether difference safety efficacy two type drug-eluting stent . Objective : To determine difference safety efficacy sirolimus paclitaxel elute stent .
DOC.brief_title: Sirolimus-Eluting Versus Paclitaxel-Eluting Stents Coronary Revascularization
DOC.detailed_description: Design : Randomized control , observer-blind trial compare sirolimus-eluting stent paclitaxel-eluting stent Patients : 1012 patient undergo percutaneous coronary intervention . The two group similar baseline clinical angiographic characteristic .
DOC.criteria: Patients either stable angina acute coronary syndrome eligible participate least one lesion stenosis least 50 percent vessel reference diameter 2.25 4.00 mm suitable stent implantation . Allergy antiplatelet drug , heparin , stainless steel , contrast agent , sirolimus , paclitaxel ; participation another coronarydevice study ; terminal illness .
